Question: By the time In a Silent Way had been recorded in February 1969, this person had augmented his quintet with additional players.
Hints: This person dropped out of Juilliard after asking permission from his father.
The sign announcing the performance gave a surprising prominence to the role of the arrangers: "this person Nonet.
This was the first of many recordings this person contributed to in this period, mostly as a sideman.
